comments:
Eclipse 20040428, Cheetah04

I have a project that continuously gives the following internal compiler 
error. The error occurs on every second save (only on incremental builds?). 
Unfortunately I was not able to track down the error to a small piece of code, 
so I am attaching the whole package.

source code line are different, I cannot see, why this is the same problem.

This is actually a dup of a different problem. Works now.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 59983 ***
